U

unloadedWeapons - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
The list of unloaded weapons the Player has, which are the weapons that cannot shoot until reloaded, the length is between 0 and 3
unloadedWeapons - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.snapshots.PublicPlayerSnapshot
List of strings which represents, by name, all the unloaded weapons the player has.
unloadedWeaponsCost - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.snapshots.PublicPlayerSnapshot
List of strings which represent the costs associated with every unloaded weapon the player has.
unloadWeapon(WeaponCard) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
This method moves a weapon from the unloaded list to the loaded list
updateActionData(RemoteAction.Data) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.ActionHandler

Updates the remote action with the choices of the user.
updateActionData(RemoteAction.Data) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.actionhandler.ActionHandlerGUI
 
updateData(RemoteAction.Data) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.RemoteAction
Changes the data parameter according to how the board state has changed.
updateKillShotTrack(List<PlayerColor>, Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Match
This method updates the kill shot track whenever a player is killed and its points are assigned, it also updates finalFrenzy and the frenzyStarter when needed
updateView(MatchSnapshot) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CLIMessenger
Calls 2 different methods which both display a part of the game state
upperVBox - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.login.NewLoginGUI
 
use(PowerUpCard) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.action.Action
Checks whether the power up gotten as input in contained in the list of the usable power up cards.
use(PowerUpCard) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.action.CounterPowerUpAction
This method assigns the shoot function of the input power up card to this class's shoot function, then it makes the input power up card the selected one.
